name: Frog Guy
description:
Short platform game, made to practice and learn.  Game  style like Celeste and Meat Boy where the presicion in the jump is the key.

 Be prepared to die sometimes xD.

In the process of making the game, I learned that these types of games don't use rigidbodys and physics, but mine does, the next attempt to make a platform game I'll try to make one that way to get more precision in the controls.

The game runs more fluidly if you download it and it has a best times save system that only works in standalone if u want to try speedruns xD.

CONTROLS
KeyboardController*MoveArrows/ASDWD-padJumpSpaceXDashJ
R1PauseEscapeStart

* The joystick may not work well, I did not make a key remap system. If it doesn't work correctly use keyboard or some remap program like x360ce.

CREDITS
  • Pixel Frog  / pixel adventure asset.
